about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a final-year Computer Engineering student at UPC with extensive experience across all areas of software development. From low-level assembly programming to complex 3D structures with OpenGL, server management, and containerization. I've worked on large team projects with over 50 members and developed various mobile applications and server services on my own.
